trailingComments.value:
*
         * @name window.enablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Enables the perl profiler for the given path or paths that match it with the given name.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp} path Request path(s) that we want to profile/analyse.
         * @param {String} profile Name where all the profile files will be stored.
         * @returns {String}

leadingComments.value:
*
         * @name window.enablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Enables the perl profiler for the given path or paths that match it with the given name.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp} path Request path(s) that we want to profile/analyse.
         * @param {String} profile Name where all the profile files will be stored.
         * @returns {String}

trailingComments.value:
*
         * @name window.disablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Disables the profiler for the given path, or if not given, for all previously configured paths.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp|undefined|null} path Path which we want to stop profilling,
         *   if not given, all will be disabled.
         * @returns {String}

leadingComments.value:
*
         * @name window.disablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Disables the profiler for the given path, or if not given, for all previously configured paths.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp|undefined|null} path Path which we want to stop profilling,
         *   if not given, all will be disabled.
         * @returns {String}

trailingComments.value: Create a watcher for store perl profiler data.

the enclosed file COPYING for license information (GPL). If you
did not receive this file, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt.

*
         * @name window.enablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Enables the perl profiler for the given path or paths that match it with the given name.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp} path Request path(s) that we want to profile/analyse.
         * @param {String} profile Name where all the profile files will be stored.
         * @returns {String}

*
         * @name window.disablePerlProfiler
         * @description
         *   Disables the profiler for the given path, or if not given, for all previously configured paths.
         * @function
         * @param {String|RegExp|undefined|null} path Path which we want to stop profilling,
         *   if not given, all will be disabled.
         * @returns {String}
Create a watcher for store perl profiler data.
